subtitleNullable: There are three categories of worldwide news in this dataset
descriptionNullable:
# Context
This dataset contains some news from 2018-01-04 to 2024-03-31 in three categories.
the categories are "politic", "technology" and "science".


# How are they labeled?
We gathered the news from three seemingly affiliated Telegram channels: science, technology, and world news (including politics). Each channel's messages are labeled accordingly.


# Reference
This dataset was collected from these resources:
- https://t.me/WorldNews
- https://t.me/Technology_AI_Gadget_Daily_News
- https://t.me/Science_News_Facts_Updates_daily
